mainwindow module

class mainwindow.MainWindow

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Class for the main window displaying app widgets for all the applications. User can add new applications from here and edit the existing application configuration.

col

The number of columns for the grid layout displaying the app widgets.

Type

int

con

The database storing all the application configurations.

Type

QSqlDatabase

add_widgets()

Function for getting data from database and adding app widgets to the main window.

col: int = 0
con = <PyQt5.QtSql.QSqlDatabase object>
new()

This function opens an Add New Dialog. It updates the app widgets displaying on the main window when a new application is added. Otherwise, it removes the temporary saved environment variables.

resizeEvent(event)

Override function to change the number of columns for the grid layout depending on the window width.
